tool_description:
API for getting basic country info like name, code, dial-code, flag, currency-code, continent.
This API will returns the basic data of the country. It will support to fetch all country data, search by country name, get country info by country-code, currency-code and continent, etc…

function.name: all_country_list
function.description:
This API will return all country details from the server. It contains the following info
Country Name
Country Code
Dial Code
Continent
Currency Code

function.name: search_country_by_country_name
function.description: This API will return the country info based on the query value which is passing in query string

function.name: get_country_info_by_continent
function.description: This API will return basic info of a country which is exactly matched with the continent name in param

function.name: get_country_info_by_currency_code
function.description: This API will return basic info of a country which is exactly matched with the currency code in param

function.name: get_country_info_by_country_code
function.description: This API will return basic info of a country which is exactly matched with the country code in param
